com.esri.mo2.file.shp
Class DbaseRow

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.file.shp.DbaseRow
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Data, Identifiable, Row
public class DbaseRow
extends Object
implements Row, Identifiable

this class contains the contents of a row from a DbaseTable.

Important note: This class uses com.esri.mo2.util.Date objects. All Date objects used by this class are referenced from GMT0. All Date values subsequently read from or written to the underlying file are interpreted from GMT0.
